languages.text: "Мои сородичи, должно быть, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}продолжают искать дорогу{/d} в {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутину{/g}. Пусть дух Лилэтан поможет им в этом — за вратами лежит спасение, а может, и знания о судьбе Крудараха и иных выживших".

traits.locale_text: "Мои сородичи, должно быть, продолжают искать дорогу в {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутину{/g}. Пусть дух Лилэтан поможет им в этом — за вратами лежит спасение, а может, и знания о судьбе Крудараха и иных выживших".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "My kin are probably {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}still looking{/d} for a means to enter the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. May the Lilaethan's spirit aid them in this endeavour — beyond the gate lies salvation, and perhaps even knowledge about the fate of Crudarach and the remaining survivors."
languages.original_text: "Мои сородичи, должно быть, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}продолжают искать дорогу{/d} в {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутину{/g}. Пусть дух Лилэтан поможет им в этом — за вратами лежит спасение, а может, и знания о судьбе Крудараха и иных выживших".

May the Lilaethan's spirit aid them in this endeavour — beyond the gate lies salvation, and perhaps even knowledge about the fate of Crudarach and the remaining survivors."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我的族人或许{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}还在寻找{/d}进入{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}的方法，愿莉莱赞的世界之魂协助他们取得成果。门后或许就是救赎，甚至可能会找到克鲁达拉赫与剩余幸存者命运的真相。”
languages.original_text: "My kin are probably {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}still looking{/d} for a means to enter the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. May the Lilaethan's spirit aid them in this endeavour — beyond the gate lies salvation, and perhaps even knowledge about the fate of Crudarach and the remaining survivors."

traits.locale_text: “我的族人或许还在寻找进入{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}的方法，愿莉莱赞的世界之魂协助他们取得成果。门后或许就是救赎，甚至可能会找到克鲁达拉赫与剩余幸存者命运的真相。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "My kin are probably still looking for a means to enter the Webway. May the Lilaethan's spirit aid them in this endeavour — beyond the gate lies salvation, and perhaps even knowledge about the fate of Crudarach and the remaining survivors."

languages.text: «Mis hermanos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}seguirán buscando{/d} una forma de acceder a la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g}. Que el espíritu del Lilaethan les ayude en sus esfuerzos: tras el portal se haya la salvación, y quizá incluso información sobre el destino de Crudarach y los supervivientes restantes».
languages.original_text: "My kin are probably {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}still looking{/d} for a means to enter the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. May the Lilaethan's spirit aid them in this endeavour — beyond the gate lies salvation, and perhaps even knowledge about the fate of Crudarach and the remaining survivors."

traits.locale_text: «Mis hermanos seguirán buscando una forma de acceder a la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g}. Que el espíritu del Lilaethan les ayude en sus esfuerzos: tras el portal se haya la salvación, y quizá incluso información sobre el destino de Crudarach y los supervivientes restantes».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我の同族はまだ{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}に入る方法を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}まさ探している{/d}のだろう。リラエタンの魂が、彼らのこの努力に救いを与えんことを…ゲートの向こうには救いがあり、おそらくクルダラと残された生存者の運命についての知識さえもあるのだ」
languages.original_text: "My kin are probably {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}still looking{/d} for a means to enter the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. May the Lilaethan's spirit aid them in this endeavour — beyond the gate lies salvation, and perhaps even knowledge about the fate of Crudarach and the remaining survivors."

traits.locale_text: 「我の同族はまだ{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}に入る方法を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}まさ探している{/d}のだろう。リラエタンの魂が、彼らのこの努力に救いを与えんことを…ゲートの向こうには救いがあり、おそらくクルダラと残された生存者の運命についての知識さえもあるのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Mein Volk {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}sucht vermutlich noch immer{/d} nach einem Weg, das {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netz der Tausend Tore{/g} zu betreten. Möge der Geist der Welt der Lileath ihnen bei diesem Unterfangen helfen. Jenseits des Tores liegt die Erlösung, und vielleicht sogar das Wissen, was aus Crudarach und den verbleibenden Überleben geworden ist."
languages.original_text: "My kin are probably {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}still looking{/d} for a means to enter the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. May the Lilaethan's spirit aid them in this endeavour — beyond the gate lies salvation, and perhaps even knowledge about the fate of Crudarach and the remaining survivors."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Volk sucht vermutlich noch immer nach einem Weg, das {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netz der Tausend Tore{/g} zu betreten. Möge der Geist der Welt der Lileath ihnen bei diesem Unterfangen helfen. Jenseits des Tores liegt die Erlösung, und vielleicht sogar das Wissen, was aus Crudarach und den verbleibenden Überleben geworden ist."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Mon peuple doit {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}toujours chercher{/d} un moyen d'accéder à la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g}. Puisse l'esprit de la lilaethan les aider à y parvenir, car au-delà du portail se trouve le salut, et peut-être même les réponses que nous nous posons tous sur le sort de Crudarach et des autres survivants. »
languages.original_text: "My kin are probably {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}still looking{/d} for a means to enter the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. May the Lilaethan's spirit aid them in this endeavour — beyond the gate lies salvation, and perhaps even knowledge about the fate of Crudarach and the remaining survivors."

traits.locale_text: « Mon peuple doit toujours chercher un moyen d'accéder à la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g}. Puisse l'esprit de la lilaethan les aider à y parvenir, car au-delà du portail se trouve le salut, et peut-être même les réponses que nous nous posons tous sur le sort de Crudarach et des autres survivants. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Soydaşlarım muhtemelen hâlâ {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol'a{/g} girmenin bir yolunu {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}arıyorlardır{/d}. Lilaethan'ın ruhu, uğraşlarında onlara yardımcı olsun. Geçit'in ardında kurtuluş yatıyor. Belki Crudarach'ın ve hayatta kalanların akıbeti bile orada gizlidir."
languages.original_text: "My kin are probably {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}still looking{/d} for a means to enter the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g}. May the Lilaethan's spirit aid them in this endeavour — beyond the gate lies salvation, and perhaps even knowledge about the fate of Crudarach and the remaining survivors."

traits.locale_text: "Soydaşlarım, muhtemelen hâlâ {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol{/g}'a girmenin bir yolunu arıyorlardır. Lilaethan'ın ruhu, uğraşlarında onlara yardımcı olsun. Geçidin ardında kurtuluş yatıyor. Belki Crudarach'ın ve hayatta kalanların akıbeti bile orada gizlidir."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
